thread.title: Snapchat Names Former Mattel Executive Drew Vollero Its Finance Chief
thread.title_full: Snapchat Names Former Mattel Executive Drew Vollero Its Finance Chief - WSJ

author: Douglas MacMillan
title: Snapchat Names Former Mattel Executive Drew Vollero Its Finance Chief
text:
Snapchat Inc., one of the most highly valued private tech startups, finally hired someone to run its finances.
Drew Vollero, a former finance executive at toy maker Mattel Inc., is joining Snapchat as vice president of finance and acting chief financial officer, the company told The Wall Street Journal Tuesday. Mr. Vollero will report to Imran Khan, a former technology banker hired last year to oversee strategy at the mobile... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
